advancement.eldenrpg.grace.title: Grace
advancement.eldenrpg.grace.description: You can set your spawn, heal, upgrade your flask and can access to your chest.
advancement.eldenrpg.fakeblock.title: Ghost Blocks
advancement.eldenrpg.fakeblock.descripti: There are many ghost blocks where you can pass through. Behind these, some interesting equipment may be hidden...
advancement.eldenrpg.goldenseed.title: Golden Seeds
advancement.eldenrpg.goldenseed.descript: The golden seeds are used to increase your flasks' number
advancement.eldenrpg.map.title: Map
advancement.eldenrpg.map.description: In the whole map, you can find pillars with parts of the map.
advancement.eldenrpg.root.title: EldenRPG
advancement.eldenrpg.sacredtear.title: Sacred Tears
advancement.eldenrpg.sacredtear.descript: Sacred Tears are used to increase your flasks' level

eldenrpg.flasks.screen.maxFlasks: You have already reached the maximum number of flasks...

eldenrpg.recommendation.screen.shaderlig: Enable Advanced Colored Lightning (Performance Settings) : 4 Chunks
entity.eldenrpg.blacksmith.dialogue2: Can you kill these 5 green and slimy creatures in my house?
entity.eldenrpg.blacksmith.dialogue3: You will have a good reward if you do it!
entity.eldenrpg.blacksmith.dialogue4: Go kill these 5 slimes to have the reward, adventurer!
entity.eldenrpg.blacksmith.dialogue5: You are my hero ! Here your reward.
entity.eldenrpg.blacksmith.dialogue6: Thanks again for getting these critters out of my house!
item.eldenrpg.key.desc: Right click on an iron door to open it.
